data.name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Medic
data.description: A S.H.I.E.L.D. agent trained to provide emergency medical attention in the field.

starItems.name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Medic
starItems.description: A S.H.I.E.L.D. agent trained to provide emergency medical attention in the field.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage. On Crit, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>. On Crit, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>. On Crit, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary target
Always apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>. On Crit, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>. On Crit, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> turns. On Crit, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> turns. On Crit, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

1.description:
Heal the <color=#86e619>3</color> most injured allies for <color=#86e619>200</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If allies are <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>, then heal for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
If Coulson is an ally and dead, revive him 
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> dead ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health

2.description:
If Coulson is an ally and dead, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> him with <color=#86e619>51%</color> Health. <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> dead ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health.

Heal the <color=#86e619>3</color> most injured allies for <color=#86e619>200</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If allies are <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>, then heal for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

3.description:
If Coulson is an ally and dead, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> him with <color=#86e619>51%</color> Health. <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> dead ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health.

Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>200</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If allies are <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>, then heal for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

4.description:
If Coulson is an ally and dead, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> him with <color=#86e619>51%</color> Health. <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> dead ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health.

Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>700</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If allies are <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>, then heal for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Healing for all allies
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Healing for <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>

5.description:
If Coulson is an ally and dead, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> him with <color=#86e619>51%</color> Health. <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> dead ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health.

Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>700</color> Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If allies are <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>, then heal for an additional <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

6.description:
If Coulson is an ally and dead, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> him with <color=#86e619>51%</color> Health. <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> dead ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health.

Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>1,100</color> Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If allies are <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>, then heal for an additional <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

7.description:
If Coulson is an ally and dead, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> him with <color=#86e619>51%</color> Health. <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> dead ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health.

Heal all allies for <color=#86e619>1,500</color> Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

If allies are <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color>, then heal for an additional <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

1.description:
On turn, <color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to heal most injured ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

If ally is Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, then apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>If ally is Coulson, then apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

2.description:
On turn, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to heal most injured ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

If ally is Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, then apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>If ally is Coulson, then apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

3.description:
On turn, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to heal most injured ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

If ally is Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, then apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>If ally is Coulson, then apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

4.description:
On turn, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to heal most injured ally for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

If ally is Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, then apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>If ally is Coulson, then apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

5.description:
On turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to heal most injured ally for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

If ally is Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, then apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>If ally is Coulson, then apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
